Articles.Content:
This is my remake of the Boeing CST-100 that Boeing entered into NASA's Commercial Crew Program (CCP) that was designed to transfer crew to and from the International Space Station.

Only three mods are required: Deployable Airbags. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83134-23-5-Deployable-Airbags-%28plugin-version%29-v0-1-3-2014-06-18](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83134-23-5-Deployable-Airbags-%28plugin-version%29-v0-1-3-2014-06-18)

RealChute. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-1-0-2-Wenkel-Corporation-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-v1-3-2-3-2-05-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-1-0-2-Wenkel-Corporation-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-v1-3-2-3-2-05-15)

And TweakScale (thanks pTrevTrevs) [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-0-90-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-%28v1-50-2014-12-24-10-40-UTC%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-0-90-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-%28v1-50-2014-12-24-10-40-UTC%29)

If You Want Me To Recreate Any More Craft, Just Let Me Know ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Tips: Heatshield Will Separate When Parachutes Fully Deploy

When Heatsheild Has Separated, Press 1 To Inflate Airbags

Pic: [http://imgur.com/CNoYcfH](http://imgur.com/CNoYcfH)

download link: [https://www./?r91gs9mreob8esi](https://www./?r91gs9mreob8esi)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T18:17:19Z" title="05/26/2015 06:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by BananaIsAFruit**
  
added tweakscale in mod list
It looks like Tweakscale is also required, for that smaller second stage fuel tank.

> 
> It looks like Tweakscale is also required, for that smaller second stage fuel tank.

 oh yeah, thanks. ill add it on ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

 anyone know how i can fix it?

this has happened to me twice now!
